item.title: Cyborgs & hyperloops: The wait continues
item.description: The first flying car was approved by regulators in 1956, but here we are, still stuck on the road. Hyperloops require route-length concrete tubes propped up on towers in the sky – as technically infeasible as the hovering trains once imagined too. Impressive as today’s AI applications are, we don’t have artificial general intelligence, the ability to make a machine think.

item.title: OpenAI Releases ChatGPT Search Engine, Taking On Google
item.description: OpenAI ramped up its ChatGPT generative AI chatbot with search engine capabilities, as the startup takes on Google's decades-long dominance of web search.

item.title: The Bose QuietComfort earbuds are a decent budget option from the premium brand
item.description: The Bose QuietComfort earbuds are the new affordable offering from the brand, retailing for $179. We spent three weeks with them to see how they stack up to other premium earbuds.

item.title: How to identify AI-generated videos
item.description: We now live in a world where AI deepfakes and AI-generated images look almost as good as the real thing. Here's how to build your AI literacy and what to look for when debunking AI-generated videos.

item.title: Get a Microsoft suite bundle for work and play for just $72
item.description: Get the complete Microsoft suite for work and play, including Windows 11 Pro, Office Professional Plus 2019, Project, and Visio — all for just $71.97.

item.title: Launch your new career in cybersecurity with this ethical hacking bundle, only $40 for one more day
item.description: Gain hands-on hacking skills with 132 hours of ethical hacking courses covering Python, WiFi, BitNinja, and more.

item.title: This could be your coding command center
item.description: Code faster, smarter, and across platforms with Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022 — just $29.97 for a limited time.

item.title: Modernize your cars tech with this $95 dash display
item.description: Upgrade your car’s tech with this sleek 9" wireless display for just $94.97 (reg. $179) through November 3.

item.title: Get a beginner-friendly 4K drone for just $64.97 — ideal for first-timers
item.description: The feature-packed 4K dual-camera drone has obstacle avoidance and is on sale for just $64.97 (reg. $119.99) through November 3.

item.title: The best noise-cancelling earbuds include the most comfortable buds I've ever tested
item.description: We tested the best noise-canceling earbuds to find the truly elite. Here are the top buds from Bose, Sony, Apple, and Beats.
